SEARCH

Class BattleLog.Entry

java.lang.Object
BattleLog.Entry
Enclosing class:
BattleLog
public static class BattleLog.Entry extends Object
The Entry class represents a single entry in the battle log. It contains information about the action, the actor, the target, the description, the round, and the type of entry. It is used to record the details of each action taken during the battle. Each entry is created with the relevant information and can be printed to the console for debugging or logging purposes.
